class="HeroBanner_overviewWrapper__zZmdm"><div class="HeroBanner_overview__ydHtV"><div class="TemplateOverview_container__pPfNx" data-testid="tdp-overview"><h1 class="Typography_base__xiSzB TemplateOverview_templateTitle__R1xnT Typography_h3__2AqsN" data-testid="typography-h1">Investment tracker</h1><div class="TemplateOverview_buttonGroup__QF9ID"></div></div></div></div><div class="HeroBanner_thumbnailWrapper__S0Vkm"><div class="w-full HeroBanner_thumbnail__RFkrk" style="aspect-ratio:1.2925" title="Investment tracker black modern simple"><img alt="Investment tracker black modern simple" fetchpriority="high" decoding="async" data-nimg="fill" class="object-contain" class="TemplateDescription_container__v5vPm"><div class="SectionFullBackground_container__GQnOp templateDetailsPage_background__9Rwe9"></div><div class="TemplateDescription_content__tNG0e spacing_ptComponent__TlWTp spacing_pbComponent__AcIT3"><div class="TemplateDescription_templateDescription__NlAXW"><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB TemplateDescription_templateDescriptionContent__W13YU Typography_body__u6UYT" data-testid="typography-body"><bdi>Use Excel to track your investments. It&#x27;s as easy as typing text into a cell and converting it to the Stocks data type. Stocks is a new Excel feature for Microsoft 365 subscribers and is considered linked data because it connects to an online data source. That connection allows you to bring back rich, interesting information that you can work with and refresh. This accessible investment tracking spreadsheet template is perfect for stock portfolio tracking and gives you a simple overview of your current portfolio with current prices and details of your assets.
</bdi></p></div><div class="TemplateDescription_sellingPoints__jawVa"><ul><li><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB Typography_body__u6UYT Typography_inline__LOWJb" data-testid="typography-body">100% fully customizable template</p></li><li><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB Typography_body__u6UYT Typography_inline__LOWJb" data-testid="typography-body">Easily change the text, images, and TemplateDescription_templateDescriptionContent__W13YU Typography_body__u6UYT" data-testid="typography-body"><bdi>Keep track of your equipment and other fixed assets with this accessible spreadsheet template. declining balance methods.</bdi></p></div><div class="TemplateDescription_sellingPoints__jawVa"><ul><li><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB Typography_body__u6UYT Typography_inline__LOWJb" videos</p></li><li><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB Typography_body__u6UYT Typography_inline__LOWJb" data-testid="typography-body">Quickly share and publish class="TemplateDescription_container__v5vPm"><div class="SectionFullBackground_container__GQnOp templateDetailsPage_background__9Rwe9"></div><div class="TemplateDescription_content__tNG0e spacing_ptComponent__TlWTp spacing_pbComponent__AcIT3"><div class="TemplateDescription_templateDescription__NlAXW"><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB TemplateDescription_templateDescriptionContent__W13YU Typography_body__u6UYT" data-testid="typography-body"><bdi>Empower your business finances with a balance sheet template that shows year-to-year comparisons, increases or decreases in net worth, assets and liabilities, and more. Determine equity and make more informed business decisions. Complete with balance sheet examples to get you started, this personal balance sheet template is easy to use and customize. This Excel balance sheet template, lets you do more in less time. This is an accessible template.</bdi></p></div><div class="TemplateDescription_sellingPoints__jawVa"><ul><li><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB Typography_body__u6UYT Typography_inline__LOWJb" spacing_ptComponent__TlWTp spacing_pbComponent__AcIT3"><div class="TemplateDescription_templateDescription__NlAXW"><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB TemplateDescription_templateDescriptionContent__W13YU Typography_body__u6UYT" data-testid="typography-body"><bdi>This accessible interactive grocery list template allows you to shop smart by breaking down totals within personalized categories of groceries. Categorize your food items and see just where the money is going. Excel does the heavy lifting by automatically calculating each category total within the grocery list template.

</bdi></p></div><div class="TemplateDescription_sellingPoints__jawVa"><ul><li><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB Typography_body__u6UYT Typography_inline__LOWJb" data-testid="typography-body">100% fully fonts</p></li><li><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB Typography_body__u6UYT Typography_inline__LOWJb" data-testid="typography-body">Dazzle followers with animations, transitions, or videos</p></li><li><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB Typography_body__u6UYT Typography_inline__LOWJb" data-testid="typography-body">Quickly share and publish anywhere</p></li></ul></div></div></section><div id="RelatedTemplates" class="spacing_mtComponent__7rC_a spacing_mbComponent__drMKT"><h2 class="Typography_base__xiSzB spacing_ptComponent__TlWTp spacing_pbComponent__AcIT3"><div class="TemplateDescription_templateDescription__NlAXW"><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB TemplateDescription_templateDescriptionContent__W13YU Typography_body__u6UYT" data-testid="typography-body"><bdi>This accessible warehouse inventory template allows users to track and maintain inventory bin locations within a warehouse. This warehouse inventory template includes the ability to print a pick list, be flagged when it&#x27;s reordering time, retrieve information on specific bins, and keep track of inventory value.
</bdi></p></div><div class="TemplateDescription_sellingPoints__jawVa"><ul><li><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB Typography_body__u6UYT Typography_inline__LOWJb" data-testid="typography-body">100% fully fonts</p></li><li><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB Typography_body__u6UYT Typography_inline__LOWJb" data-testid="typography-body">Dazzle followers with animations, transitions, or videos</p></li><li><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB Typography_body__u6UYT Typography_inline__LOWJb" data-testid="typography-body">Quickly share and publish anywhere</p></li></ul></div></div></section><div id="RelatedTemplates" class="spacing_mtComponent__7rC_a spacing_mbComponent__drMKT"><h2 class="Typography_base__xiSzB TemplateDescription_templateDescriptionContent__W13YU Typography_body__u6UYT" data-testid="typography-body"><bdi>Set your retirement goals and determine how much to save and invest with a retirement planning template. Find out if you&#x27;re saving enough for retirement and prepare for the future with easy to use financial tools from Excel. This Microsoft planning template will calculate and chart the required earnings and savings required each year to achieve your goals. This is an accessible template. 
</bdi></p></div><div class="TemplateDescription_sellingPoints__jawVa"><ul><li><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB Typography_body__u6UYT Typography_inline__LOWJb" data-testid="typography-body">100% fully customizable template</p></li><li><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB Typography_body__u6UYT Typography_inline__LOWJb" data-testid="typography-body">Easily change the text, images, and more</p></li><li><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB Typography_body__u6UYT Typography_inline__LOWJb" data-testid="typography-body">Get creative with thousands of photos, graphics, and fonts</p></li><li><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB Typography_body__u6UYT Typography_inline__LOWJb" data-testid="typography-body">Dazzle followers with animations, transitions, or TemplateDescription_templateDescriptionContent__W13YU Typography_body__u6UYT" data-testid="typography-body"><bdi>Keep track of parts and products with this inventory template for Excel. Use the inventory list template to note items in stock by name, description, and unit price. The Excel inventory template also tracks stock reorder level, reorder time, quantity to reorder, and whether the item is discontinued to help you stay on top of your ordering. Perfect for offices, manufacturing plants, artists studios, repair shops, and more, the inventory checklist template helps keep your business running smoothly. This is an accessible template.</bdi></p></div><div class="TemplateDescription_sellingPoints__jawVa"><ul><li><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB Typography_body__u6UYT Typography_inline__LOWJb" TemplateDescription_templateDescriptionContent__W13YU Typography_body__u6UYT" data-testid="typography-body"><bdi>Customize this simple invoice template for your small business or employer. </bdi></p></div><div class="TemplateDescription_sellingPoints__jawVa"><ul><li><p class="Typography_base__xiSzB Typography_body__u6UYT Typography_inline__LOWJb" data-testid="typography-body">100% fully
